EmailTemplate.name: Jan 2016 LD consultants survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Live Different Consultant 2016/17 program feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Happy New Year! I hope 2016 is off to an excellent start for you. I am reaching out to you as you are on our list of educators who are willing to be a Live Different Consultant. We are looking for your input and feedback as we begin to plan our 2016/17 school programming. Over the past 2 years, our teacher consultants have provided ideas and advice that has resulted in important improvements to our program. Thank you so much for your continued help; you are making a real difference in students' lives by contributing in this way.
Here is the survey link: https://www.tfaforms.com/forms/view/406488?tfa_19={!Contact.Name}&tfa_20={!Account.Name}&tfa_3={!Contact.Id}
Thank you again for your time and wisdom. If you prefer to give your feedback conversationally, I would be happy to chat with you and can be reached anytime at the numbers below.
â€‹Kindest Regards,
Ryan Wood
Ryan Wood Director of Canadian Programs
Live Different
Suite B3 - 15 Wellington St. North
Hamilton, ON L8R 1M7
Canada
905-929-1662 Cell 905-777-1662 Office 905-777-8117 Fax ryan@livedifferent.com
www.livedifferent.com
Check out this video about our school presentation: http://youtu.be/mGWCT8IS1Oo
Live Different is a movement challenging ourselves and others to a lifestyle of caring for people, not stuff. Live Different
